bilancio

Class TableExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bilancio.TableExporter

  • public abstract class TableExporter
extends Object
    This class exports a JTable in various types of text file:
    • Excel
    • Open Document (.ods)
    • CSV (Comma Separated Values)
    • Text separated by a string defined by the user
    Author:
    Mirco Romagnoli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableExporter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void exportCSV(JTable table, File file)
      Exports the table in the CSV format.
      static void exportExcel(JTable table, File file)
      Exports the table in the .xls format
      Apache POI libraries are used to export the table as an Excel document
      static void exportOOP(JTable table, File file)
      Exports the table in the .ods format.
      static void exportText(JTable table, File file, String columnSeparator)
      Exports the table as a text file separated by a separator string

        public TableExporter()

    • Method Detail

      • exportExcel

        public static void exportExcel(JTable table,
                               File file)
                        throws IOException
        Exports the table in the .xls format
        Apache POI libraries are used to export the table as an Excel document
        Parameters:
        table - Table to export
        file - File to write
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by the FileOutputStream if something at the moment of his instantiation went wrong
        See Also:
        JTable, File, FileOutputStream

      • exportOOP

        public static void exportOOP(JTable table,
                             File file)
                      throws FileNotFoundException,
                             IOException
        Exports the table in the .ods format.
        JOpenDocument libraries are used to export the table.
        Parameters:
        table - Table to export
        file - File to write
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Thrown is the file is not found
        IOException - Thrown if an error occurs while writing the table on the file
        See Also:
        JTable, File

      • exportCSV

        public static void exportCSV(JTable table,
                             File file)
                      throws IOException
        Exports the table in the CSV format.
        The CSV is a text file where every row represent his corresponding on the table and each column is separated by the other using a comma ','.
        This format can be easily imported by a spreadsheet editor (for example: LibreOffice Calc, Excel)
        Parameters:
        table - Table to export
        file - File to write
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while writing the file
        See Also:
        JTable, File

      • exportText

        public static void exportText(JTable table,
                              File file,
                              String columnSeparator)
                       throws IOException
        Exports the table as a text file separated by a separator string
        Parameters:
        table - Table to export
        file - File to write
        columnSeparator - Separator string
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs writing the file
        See Also:
        JTable, File
